title: Rotational kinematics - falling block with pulley

content.description: A block of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is attached to a string that wraps many times around a pulley of radius <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> as shown.
